definition: to work for a trial period/worker on probation
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
erhua variant of 試手|试手[shi4 shou3]

sentences.english: The little boy tried his hand at chess.
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩在棋局上試手。
